Row.Text: Outremer Unique Building. +4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Rural District. Acts as a Fortified District that must be conquered. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building. Can be purchased in Towns. Ageless.
Outremer Unique Building. Acts as a Fortified District that must be conquered. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another Building. Can be purchased in Towns. Ageless.
